import React, { Component } from "react"; import RightTop from "../../../components/rightbar/rightTop"; import RightBottom from "../../../components/rightbar/rightBottom"; import jsPDF from "jspdf"; import html2canvas from "html2canvas"; class InvoiceDetail extends Component { printPDF = () => { html2canvas(document.querySelector(".section-to-print"), { logging: true, letterRendering: 1, allowTaint: false, useCORS: true, }).then((canvas) => { var imgData = canvas.toDataURL("image/jpeg", 1); var pdf = new jsPDF("p", "mm", "a4"); var pageWidth = pdf.internal.pageSize.getWidth() - 22; var pageHeight = pdf.internal.pageSize.getHeight() - 22; var imageWidth = canvas.width; var imageHeight = canvas.height; var ratio = imageWidth / imageHeight >= pageWidth / pageHeight ? pageWidth / imageWidth : pageHeight / imageHeight; pdf.addImage( imgData, "JPEG", 10, 10, imageWidth * ratio, imageHeight * ratio ); pdf.save("invoice.pdf"); }); }; render() { return ( <>
